## Ignore build results
bin/
obj/

## Ignore user-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files
.vscode/
.vs/

## Ignore database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

## Ignore NuGet packages
*.nupkg
packages/
*.snupkg

## Ignore log files
*.log

## Ignore publish folder
publish/
out/

## Ignore environment config
appsettings.Development.json

## Ignore system files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

## Ignore Web auto-generated files
wwwroot/lib/
node_modules/

# Rider project files
.idea/
*.sln.iml
